alert.note: Alert for Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Luzerne County through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ricketts Glen State Park to Mainville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Berwick, Nanticoke, Plains, Plymouth, Exeter and Swoyersville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 165. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to reduced visibilities. At times, frequent cloud to ground lightning has occurred with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
